alert.note: Alert for Ashland; Richland (Ohio) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued May 26 at 6:14PM EDT by NWS Cleveland
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of central Richland and central Ashland Counties through 645 PM EDT... At 614 PM EDT, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm over Mansfield, moving northeast at 35 mph. HAZARD...Winds in excess of 40 mph. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Locations impacted include... Mansfield, Ashland, Shelby, Ontario, Lexington, Bellville, Hayesville, Savannah, Butler, Perrysville, Lucas, Jeromesville, Bailey Lakes, Mifflin, Mohicanville, Nankin, Shenandoah and Olivesburg. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.00 IN MAX WIND GUST...40 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building. Torrential rainfall is also occurring with this storm and may lead to localized flooding. Do not drive your vehicle through flooded roadways.
